resources.string: Push Learning accelerates your speed of learning by up to 10x. You will receive tasks via Push Notifications and can solve them without opening LENGO.

Your AppStore Account will be charged at confirmation of purchase. LENGO subscriptions automatically renew. Within 24 hours before the trial or subscription period ends, you will be charged through your AppStore Account: _PRICE_ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be fortified! purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Manage your subscription in your AppStore Account Settings. For more details please read our Payment Policy.

Dear <usr-name>,You are precious to us! My name is <dev-name>. I\'m contacting you regarding the exercise you put together.I like to thank you for supporting the community. Every coin other users spend on your pack will be directly transferred to your account. We look forward to reviewing your pack, <pck-name>, soon.Take care making changes to your pack from now on. It is publicly available to other users. If you have any questions, please contact us.Best regards,<dev-name>
You will receive your coins as soon as our server is working again.

Take care making changes to your pack from now on. It is publicly available to other users. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me.Best regards,<dev-name>

Unlimited access to all vocabulary and grammar content. No Ads or In-app Purchases.
Developing an app is a lot of work. With the PRO version you actively support us in the months and years to come as we continue to grow the app. Thank you so much!
An exercise is ready for you! 😍🎁🎊
The monthly cost of LENGO PRO is less than a pack of cigarettes, a language school or a set of index cards.
You don\'t have the selected language installed. Would you like to download it?
We use your feedback to improve \'pack_name\' and to suggest content you like in the future.
Invite your friends and receive 10 coins for free with each unique invitation.
Artificial intelligence accomplished this translation. Therefore, we ask you to view it cautiously. However, it is mostly correct and getting better day by day.
What a pity that you no longer want to enjoy all the benefits of the PRO version! We\'d like to know why you made that choice.
What a pity that you are leaving us! We would like to know why you want to delete your account.
By continuing, you confirm that you understand that we will remove content you unlocked with the PRO version from your device at the end of the subscription period.
After confirmation, your account will be permanently deleted with immediate effect. In case you want to take a break, consider login out instead.
The free version of LENGO is enough for me
We are also happy if you want to use LENGO for free. However, please note that you will lose access to content unlocked with the PRO version.
The PRO version is too expensive for me
Please note the PRO version and the basic version are both ad-free. You support our linguists and the further development of the app with PRO.
I had problems with the app
Feel free to visit our website for additional resources. If you have identified app misconduct, contact us via our website or the contact form under the profile.
I don\'t have time to learn a language

A powerful study was done at Massachusetts in 2007, where The American Council on the Teaching of Foreign Languages stated that: Children who study a foreign language, even when this second language study takes time away from the study of mathematics, outperform students who do not study a foreign language and have more mathematical instruction during the school day.
I have no reason to learn a foreign language
It was investigated that multilingual test persons develop Alzheimer\'s several years later on average. In addition, foreign languages are beneficial for your career and can broaden your horizons.
We will delete your account immediately with permanent effect. We do not recommend this option for stopping language learning temporarily.
I want to use everything for free
After confirmation, you only have access to content downloaded with the PRO version for the remaining term.
By continuing, you confirm that you want to remove all content associated with your account. That also includes paid content.
Your username or password is incorrect

These reminders don\'t seem to be working. So we\'ll stop sending them from now.

For those who want to take it seriously
LENGO PRO users are more likely to successfully reach their goals.
You don\'t have to write a review. Just select stars and send it. Within a few seconds, you can help us enormously. We are very grateful to you and work hard to meet all your expectations.
With the language learning app by LENGO, you can learn new vocabulary, add your own words, improve your grammar, and track your progress.

Learning languages has never been so easy! More and more people learn languages with LENGO every day. Join today and be part of our growing community! Available languages: • Arabic • Chinese • German • Danish • British • English • Finnish • French • Greek • Italian • Japanese • Korean • Dutch • Norwegian • Polish • Portuguese • Russian • Swedish • Spanish • Thai • Turkish • Ukrainian LENGO IS FREE TO USE Our goal is to make education accessible to anyone. Thus, all basic features are permanently free to use. We are continuously extending paid content as well as free content to make LENGO even better. WHAT TO EXPECT LENGO equips you with everything you need to learn the language you want. It has been shown that you can significantly reduce the time invested in learning a new language by using instant feedback, recurrent material, and other methodologies that LENGO supports. Another aspect that is likely to improve your learning success is the motivation methods, which are often missing from traditional language-learning methods. However, you still have to bring some initiative. EXTRA CONTENT? THAT\'S PREMIUM With LENGO Premium, you unlock your full potential. You unlock everything you need to learn languages as quickly and successfully as possible. ABOUT LENGO LENGO is a language learning platform that strives to enrich global human interaction by improving people’s ability to communicate. Privacy policy: https://www.lengo.io/about/privacy/ Terms of use: https://www.lengo.io/about/terms Questions? Contact us: contact@lengo.io --------------------------------------------------------------- Information about the auto-renewable nature of the subscription A subscription is not essential to get access to the full learning materials. You can also gain access by uploading content that adds value to the community. Otherwise, content can be unlocked through in-app-purchases. However, subscriptions are useful for users who want full access without any further action required. The subscribed user does not have to pay attention to our digital currency. Therefore, full access to the app is Lengo Premium. Each subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. Your AppStore account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your AppStore Account Settings. When a subscription is canceled, access to the app’s courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.
Discover new vocabulary and grammar exercises
Lose yourself in a variety of vocabulary and exercises. From beginners to experts, everyone can learn something new.
Practice speaking in a foreign language
Practice speaking in a foreign language

You can disable auto-renewal at any time. You can find the options to disable and change your subscription in the settings of your AppStore account. Any subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. The next charge will be made within 24 hours before the end of the current billing period.

You can cancel your free trial up to 24 hours before it expires. You will not incur any costs. The trial subscription is only available for new customers. After your trial expires, payment for the full amount of your chosen subscription will be processed through your AppStore account.
I hope you like my voice.

Dear [user], \\n\\nWe have received a request to reset your password. Your new initial password is: [initial.password]. Please use this password to log in to your account and remember to change it as soon as possible. \\n\\nIf you did not request this password reset, please contact our customer support team immediately. \\n\\nThank you, \\nLENGO
